item.title: Michael Crawford - The Music of the Night - Key of C - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song The Music of the Night by Michael Crawford from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: A♭, B, B♭, C, C♯m, D, D7, Dm, E, Em, E♭, F, G, G7.
